name: Falling! (Hideos)
description:
The game

This game is a platform game with elements of dungeon crawler where you have to go down a hole and face enemies along the way, but more and more, the hole is getting weird.

Controls: 

1,2,3,4 -  keys to resize the screen

Alt + Enter - fullscreen

AD - move

 W - jump

 Mouse Left Button - Shoot

Developed by: @Hideos and @Mega

Made for Ludum Dare Jam in 72 hours

Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/falling

Theme: Deeper and deeper
